ygData.subject: Re: Levels after hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes I ve done it in my code before.  That s why I find it galling that they refuse to comment on my post showing evidence that there is a sign error.  It s
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 24 Feb 2000 mike.langlois@... wrote:
>
> Anyway, I don't mean this to be harsh, I just wonder what
> causes us to blame the coders rather than the designers.
>
> Um, and that sign reversal thing does suck, btw. You have
> a point there, but I've done stupid things like that in my
> code before, and I bet you have, too :P

Yes I've done it in my code before. That's why I find it
galling that they refuse to comment on my post showing
evidence that there is a sign error. It's like they think
they're incapable of making such a common mistake.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
